concept.title: Technical Writing Textbooks
concept.shortdesc: This course requires, at a minimum, a textbook that explains the concepts and genres of technical writing.

conbody.p:
While you are free to select the textbook you believe best suits your classes, a survey of experienced ENGL 3764: Technical Writing instructors has yielded a list of popular textbooks for this course:
Practical Strategies for Technical Communication by Mike MarkelThis is a popular technical writing textbook and is the basis for the lessons and other materials described in this handbook.
The Essentials of Technical Communication by Elizabeth Tebeaux and Sam Dragga
Technical Communication Strategies for Today by Richard Johnson-Sheehan
